title: Founder & Software Engineer
bio: Cosmin is doing Software development on a multitude of Android, web and server development projects, being actively involved in all steps of the development process, from architectural design, to implementation, testing and releasing. He also worked as a software developer in various Android and server backend development projects, with active involvement in all the steps of the development process, employing various languages such as Java, Kotlin, C#, Python, JavaScript, Typescript, HTML.
shortBio: Worked as a software developer in various Android and server backend development projects, with active involvement in all the steps of the development process, employing various languages such as Java, Kotlin, C#, Python, JavaScript, Typescript, HTML
